content.detailedDescription: Hello i live in richland wa right outside of hanford,wa i saw a light floating across the sky right over the hanford area that looked like a 1000 watt high pressure sodium light. there did not appear to be any other light coming from this ship it was headed ne toword pasco in a slow calm spped no sound at all and then turned directly north and vanished into thin air like it went over or behind a hill in total clear weather. no other planes appear to take this flight path that i have ever seen. i had a weird experince afterward i tried to contact someone about it to report it and everytime i got through to a person my phone would mysteriously disconect and lose signal and this would only happen with this number. i dont know what it was for sure but the experience was weird i have also seen a series of triangle shaped objects in fresno, ca in 2001 that were seen by many
content.summary: Bright floating h.P.S. light

content.detailedDescription:
Just looking at oklahoma city on google earth when i saw 7 black objects on the street view. i have added 3 photos of these objects but i don't know if they will show up , they could be birds i don't know. 
if the pictures don't show up just go on google earth, i don't know if its on google maps and type in oklahoma city and go to street view and you will see them. 

thanks.
content.summary: Possible ufo picture

content.detailedDescription: On 7/14/2009 at around 1:30, i was looking at the moon with my video camera.  i wa practicing my zoom skills on my camera(it has a 2000x zoom).  as i was looking at the lcd panel i noticed 3 bright orbs in a line directly to the right of the moon. the top being the brightest.  the 3 orbs changed color and brightness.  the lower 2 actually disappearing individually and reappearing.  i started to film them.  i filmed for about 2 min.  i stopped recording to try to adjust the tripod but when i went to refocus in i couldn't get it to focus clearly(some cloud cover).  i was very excited to see and capture these orb.  at first, i wasn't sure i was really seeing it.  my son came out and witnessed what i was filming and was equally excited.  after i uploaded the video and had a chance to really look at it further, i notices that there is something else moving on the moon area towards the top right by a crater.  you can view it at  http://www.Youtube.Com/watch?V=qen_c6ayskm or youtube   marlorinaz1 "amazing footage ufo's by moon"
content.summary: Was practicing my zoom on my camera on the moon when i noticed several bright orb like objects by the moon.

content.detailedDescription: In my kitchen turned toward the east side of my place looking out the window when i saw this light moving quickly but i noticed there were no blinkers like a plane has and moving faster. i called my roommate who was in the living room, but when he came to the window it was gone. did anyone else see something around this time? it was a yellowish light.
content.summary: A light moving fast with no blinkers like a plane has.

content.detailedDescription: I got up to go to the bathroom while it was still very dark outside which is unusual for me.  upon stepping back into the hallway to return to bed, i immediately noticed bright orange light spilling out of my bedroom door into the hall.  i remember saying, ���what the hell?��� out loud.  as i stepped into my bedroom i noticed bright orange light coming through the window so intensely that it was making shadows in the folds of the curtains.  i went to the window, looked out, and saw a very large round orange light at the top of the neighboring hill above the trees and houses, almost solid full-moon size, very sun-like.  i turned to go get my glasses and it blinked out a couple of times and then went out completely. i returned to the window with my glasses on anyway but saw nothing.  the orange light was gone.  nothing can really be concluded since i didn���t have my glasses on for near-sightedness and the ���object��� was half of a block away . . . but there is no such light on any home or building where it was.  a couple of days later my sister, who lives 1-1/2  blocks away, immediately spoke of seeing an orange light on 3/17 upon entrance into my home for a visit.  her exact first words to us were, ���what was up with that orange light monday?���  oddly, the location where i believed the light to be when i saw it would be over a field immediately in front of my sister���s house.
content.summary: Large orange light hovered over houses.  remained stationary, then blinked and disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: I wa taking picture of a plane and when i download it in computer i saw it
content.summary: I was taking pictures of plane

content.detailedDescription:
Was out for an evening bike ride with an out-of-town friend on a beautiful sunday evening. it was still daylight. stopped to rest at wagner park in battery park city,which is across from the statue of liberty.  i was lying down on a bench looking up at the sky and an apartment building (approximately 30 stories)about 200 feet away when i noticed something out of the corner of my eye moving left to right.  before i could tell what it was, it flew (floated?) behind the apartment building.  a second later it appeared from the other side of the building and i called to my friend "what the hell is that?"  

whatever it was was round, all white, and solid looking. it had no lights and made absolutely no sound. i would estimate it to be about 15-20 feet in diameter and it must have been about 300 feet in the air because of the building height.  i would have needed a large grapefruit held at arms length away to hide it from view.  in five to eight seconds it was far in the distance heading south towards brooklyn. my guess was that it was traveling between 50 and 100 mph. unfortunately, we had no time to grab the camera-- it haunts me that we didn't get to take a photo.  

my friend thought she saw something spinning on the bottom of the sphere-- i don't remember seeing that. for most of the evening, we discussed what we had seen. definitely not a plane because it had no wings.  i thought it traveled much too fast to be a balloon and later checked the weather to confirm there was a slight wind blowing north-- the opposite direction it was traveling. so it had to be flying under its own power.

the thing that impressed me-- and i still think about--  is how smoothly and silently it traveled.  btw, this is my first time i've ever reported seeing a ufo. i would have doubted myself if my friend haruko wasn't with me to see it.  i've not reported this to any radio or tv station.  do you have any other reports?
content.summary: White sphere silently flies by at 50+ mph near wtc site...

content.detailedDescription:
I was taking my dog out at slightly after 10pm and was standing on my deck with my porch light on when this very very bright white object appeared just over the tree tops.  it had a red tail almost as long as it was.  it moved from left to right horizontally.   i had time to say to myself that it was definitely not a plane.   it was larger by far, and brighter and had no wings.  there was no sound.   i watched for about another 15 minutes but nothing furher happened.  it was not moving fast enough for a comet or meteor or shooting star, but moved faster than an airplane.
i am wondering if there were any other sightings in londonderry, nh that night.
content.summary: Very bright white object with a tail of red (like fire) moving silently over the tree tops in my backyard. larger than a plane, no wings. moved rapidly, but not like a meteor, horizontal in sky. 5 to 8 seconds and then disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: I was out for a walk around 10 o'clock. at about 10:35 i looked up straight to the north. i then seen 2 lights and about 3 seconds later a third appeared. at first i thought the lights were three helicopters or a very low airplane but they made no noise and seemed to be close enough where i should have heard them. i looked closer and the lights were actually 3 groups of 2 lights in each group. they were very close to each other and were an equal distance apart. the light on the far left then disappeared and then reappeared on the far right of the other two. this same pattern repeated two times and lasted a period of about 45 seconds. the light on the left then disappeared, and then the next one, and then the last one disappeared and they did not reappear again. there was no noise at all and the lights only moved a very short distance to the west. i was in disbelief of what i had seen.
content.summary: Saw 3 lights equal distance apart that disapeared and reapeared on the oposite side of the other 2

content.detailedDescription: I was taking a motorcycle trip along route 66 and i was riding my motorcycle to a fellow professor's cabin on lake of the ozarks missouri to stay the night off the route.  i got the directions wrong to his cabin and was heading west on highway 54 at about 11:00 p.M. cst right on the outskirts of camdenton missouri when i noticed a large sphere on the left hand side of the highway above a commercial building (it was south).  i thought it was a large dealership type balloon at first, but it started moving very slowly across the highway in a zig zag style fashion.  i immediately slowed my motorcycle speed down to about 10 mph, as i was transfixed on the object and could not keep my eyes off of it.  i thought it was maybe a hot air balloon ride as i got closer and thought it was amazing that they had hot air balloon rides so late and so low to the ground in the ozark hills.  it was a spherical type object but was not static in shape...It was hard to identify what it was for some reason.  i couldn't see any type of hot air balloon basket, but for some reason i felt as if i was being watched while riding on the bike.  i kept wanting to pull my bike over to take a picture, but was too amazed at the object that i didn't for some reason.  it was large (the size of a small house) and floating about 150 foot above the ground...It was reddish colored with a glow (i thought the glow was the fire for fire for the hot air balloon).  it passed right over the top of me along the highway and was hovering along the right side of the highway (the north side).  i was trying to find a place to pull my motorcycle over so i could take a picture, but trees were getting in the way, but i could still see the object for another 10 to 15 seconds or so.  i finally found an open spot with no trees to take the picture and within seconds of getting off my motorcycle, the object faded extremely fast heading in a 45 degree angle.  it was literally gone within a few seconds, but there were no obstructions or trees for it to dissappear behind.  it couldn't have been a hot air balloon because of the exit speed and how low to the ground it was.  it was definitely sphere-like.  the whole experience lasted only a minute or two, but i have tried to rationalize what i saw almost every minute of the day since then (it was 6 days ago).  the professor's cabin who i was staying at knew what i had seen, as he had seen the exact same type of object hovering above lake of the ozarks 3 years ago in late fall 2006.  we are co-workers at a university...Both professors...I am a law professor and he is a marketing professor.  he told me that i could come forward with his information as well.  him and his wife both witnessed the object hovering above lake of the ozarks for about 5 minutes...They could not believe their eyes...And were also so transfixed that they didn't capture it on film.  he informed me that he kicks himself all the time for not taking a picture or video, but for some reason he was so mesmerized he didn't move.  the fellow professor and his wife never told anyone but relatives in the past...But him and i have talked for hours in the past 6 days to try to rationalize what we saw, but there is no rational known explanation of the object, how it moved, it's size, shape, and aura around it.  i have never been an avid ufo follower and was not looking for a ufo...It found me...And i completely believe and now intend to spend my summers investigating this phenomenon (as a professor my summers are fairly free).  i will help you in any way i can...I am 100% certain that i witnessed a ufo...As a lawyer and law professor i am very skeptical without evidence...But the evidence was literally about 150 feet right above in front of me...It was the most amazing thing i have ever witnessed in my life.  i will remain anonymous for now, but if for proof or other purposes you may request me to come forward, i may at some later time.  i also plan to get a tattoo of what i saw on my body...I do not have a photo, sketch or audio or video as of right now, but i intend to have one created for my tattoo.
content.summary: Large red glowing spherical object moving slowly about 150 foot above ground right in front of me.

content.detailedDescription:
Around the 4th of july i was looking up ufo's being on the moon, so since then not only i've been star gazing for ufo's but also looking at the moon for any strange activity.

actual event: i was outside standing on my deck, watching the stars and the moon,between 1:30am-1:36am i saw the bright white light shooting away from the moon, it flashed once so it was like a decent gap between where the light was and the moon then it flash once more and it was gone, not a 3rd or a 4th flash. i know for a fact that an airlanes don't just turn their lighs off and the same with helicopters, and that they have more then one lights, i know other ufo's have multicolor lights but it was just 1 color 2 flashes.
content.summary: This was only like a quick 6 secs and its been bugging me

content.detailedDescription: My daughter and i were on our deck with our binoculars looking at airplanes flying by. we are frequent sky watchers. at around 9:10pm we saw a very bright reddish orange light in the east. at first i thought it was probably a planet like mars, but the light seemed too low and bright to be that. it seemed to be getting gradually larger (i think it was heading toward us). there were very distinct red and orange color, with no noise and no blinking/ strobing. after watching this for about a minute, the object began strobing a very bright white light. i watched it for about another minute and the light just faded out and i couldn't see it anymore. there were no trees obstructing my view.
content.summary: Bright red/ orange light. thought it was mars but too low in the sky and started moving.

content.detailedDescription:
1. walking on the balcony
2. i have the habit to watch the stars when the skies are clear
3. something unusual
4. it's speed was constant, but it was bright and dind't blink like an airplane
5. i was excited
6. the sky was clear, it didn't vanish into the horizont, but become less bright and less bright until it dissapeared.
content.summary: It was like a moving blue-green star that was visible several seconds. it went north-east.

content.detailedDescription: Bright light in the sky thought it was a star or planet, but it was too bright to be either, no flashing lights was stationary but moved in a circular motion, backside was not lit up, located in the se area of the sky in orange county, 2 planes flew up to or past it
content.summary: Bright light in the sky thought it was a star or planet, but it was too bright to be either, no flashing lights was stationary but moved in a circular motion, backside was not lit up, located in the se area of the sky, planes flew up to or past it

content.detailedDescription: My family and i were traveling on north bound i-55 through illinois  were were almost to joliet when i was looking for fireworks.  when i saw the object i thought it was a plane or helicopter.  it was moving very slowing from north to south and was flying at a low altitude where non comercial airplanes or helicopters would fly.  i watched it for about a minute when it just vanished.  it was colored orange and was glowing.  no lights where blinking on it and we were a couple of miles away from its actual position in the sky, but i am guessing it had to be really large.  for me to be able to see it. i guess my feelings when i saw it could be compared to when a dog sees a car.  excited.  i mentioned to my husband that their was something in the sky, but being a skeptic he won't believe they exist unless one lands in the front yard and abducts him.  i just sat in my seat and watched it. it was around 9:00 when i saw the object, and think it did reappear a couple of minutes later, but i lost sight of through the tree line.
content.summary: Saw an orange ball  glow in the sky moving and then disappearing.

content.detailedDescription: Already reported once, but now have photo to attach. i was in the target parking lot in westfield, and saw a red-orange fireball go from the target store almost right above me to clay terrace. travling north to south. then i lost sight, but got four shots with a nikon d90. this shot is zoomed in, but untouched. this was definately not an after-burner on a jet. it was going too slow, and no noise at all. my brother saw a red-orange orb in kokomo just a few days before i saw this one. he said it looked like the same thing, and was surprised i got this good of a shot.
content.summary: Red-orange fireball in westfield in. on july 5th. now have attached photo

content.detailedDescription:
It looked like the rest of the stars  it blinked five times then nothing   me my wife and my neighbour seen this  it did not move position at al during this  it last about 5 min  it was beside  the big dipper 
  
 the lady in new mexico reported something i think is the same thing i seen
content.summary: Flashing light

content.detailedDescription:
The video speaks for itself.
watch 00:50
content.summary: Not appeared when i saw the video review is really

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover), Unknown
content.detailedDescription:
Me and my friends were laying on the trampoline at my girlfirends house in wanlip in the back garden. there were 5 of us.
we were drinking/chatting and looking at the stars underneath. we noticed that there were only three. 

we meanwhile we noticed a fighter jet fly by and it was clear as we could see the outline and the lights and three seconds after it passed we heard the noise it made. it was flying quite fast! (we waved at it!)

ten minutes later, one of the three bright stars moved at more or less the same speed of the jet if not faster. it moved in the straight line but then suddently turned 90 degrees from its direction immediatelly like an l.

it then travelled into the clouds fading with its brightness.. it must have been gone 2-5 minutes or so when on the totally different side of the sky it re-appeared very bright but then slowly going dim. it then travelled away in a straight line however wavering occassionally along the way. dissapearing into the clouds.
this star like thing was travelling very fast all the time.

it was very high up as it seemed to be with the stars. me and my friends weren't scared at all we were all intregued however my girlfirend ran inside the house. we took our phones to record it but it was too dark for the cameras to work. it was identical to a star.

on the way back home i was thinking could of been a foofighter but that was impossible as otherwise we could of heard a jet and there was no way we could of seen it.
i don't know if it is a new plane or anything but if it is then raf. wittering would have picked it up on radar.

if its not a u.F.O could you please tell me what plane it was as i'm very intreaged and never seen anything like it.

yours faithfully
content.summary: Appeeared to be a star however travelling at speeds and manuvering fast.

content.detailedDescription: I was hanging out in my room, when for some reason i felt the need to look out the window, in the northwest sky there were strobing lights i watched this thing for a good 20min as it slowly seemed to drift, they were blue and red and they would change beats. like they were sending a morse code. luckily i had a pair of binoculars by (not that great but better than nothing). i was able to make out that it had what appeared to be a disc shape. i could see the colors of the strobe even better.When i first saw it i knew it wasnt a plane or helicopter for the meer fact it was staying pretty much in the same place. however i did notice that it was slowly moving.(there were powerlines in the line of view, when i first saw it, it was above them, then over 20min it moved to where it was below the powerlines. all it did was move  real slow and keep strobing. i knew i would see one soon, i think thats what lead me to the window. it eventually went over a building. i was hoping it would move around real quick like the report in oceanside. but all it did this time was move slowly. i also noticed that there 2 planes that went flying in its direction, i also saw them flying back after. this was not too far from lax, so i bet they picked something up on the radar.
content.summary: Looked like a disc but all i could see was blue lights and red lights strobing

content.detailedDescription:
I���ve attached some photos taken from my balcony in dubai, facing approx. east at approx. 5am on the  18th april 2009. i was photographing venus, when my camera wouldn���t focus on venus and kept focusing on something i couldn���t see in the view finder, but was showing up in the pictures [green object]. perhaps it���s lens flare, perhaps not?

i���ve cropped the original photos fyi.

camera: canon rebel xti [10 meg]
zoom lens: sigma 70-300
using tripod

i have high definition video footage also, although i can���t seem to see anything in the footage, although i didn���t have a 70-300 zoom lens on the hd cam.

some of the photos i forced a longer exposure, as you can see venus moving [and more light], although the green object doesn���t appear to be moving?
i took most of the photos by using a 2 second delay, so that there was no movement while pushing the button.

can you please have your experts analyze these photos and get back to me as to what you think they may be?

maybe they're lens flare?
content.summary: I’ve attached some photos taken from my balcony in dubai, facing approx. east at approx. 5am on the  18th april 2009

content.detailedDescription: On july 13,09 went out to take new puppy outside.  saw flashing star in the sky.  went in and put glasses on and watched star flashing. the bottom appeared to flash back on forth on the bottom.  watched a few more minutes not believing what i saw.  was telling spouse through door that a strange light was out there asking him to see.  went in over to couch to really talk spouse into coming.  he was sleepy and did not come.  went back out and light had vanished. started crying as i was scared and knew nobody was going to believe me any how as i always talk about "aliens".
content.summary: Flashing star

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
I copied and pasted an email below that i sent to our local news team on wave tv3 that very night.  i never heard back.  here it is:

"me, my wife, and at least 4 other neighbors witnessed what can only be explained as unidentifiable flying objects over our neighborhood on the night of july 4, 2009!  over the course of one hour, there were 5 total sightings.  on the first wave there were two sighted back to back, then every 10 minutes or so, another one would come by.  my description is as follows:

- the craft were bright orange in color.    on the approach side of the craft, it gave off a very bright, not foggy, but an almost laser precision cut orange glow, then as the vehicle would pass by, the glow dimmed a bit and appeared to morph into three nozzle-like dots, sort of like the afterburners on a fighter jet, yet still deep orange in color!

- the vehicles appeared to be just a bit lower to the ground than a typical airline glide slope height, but not knowing how to judge the size of the vehicle, i couldn't give you a good estimate as to the size or distance of the vehicle. suffice to say, they flew lower to the ground than a typical ups or commercial airline flight pattern.

- no sound was emitted by any of the vehicles, but a lot of fireworks were going off at the time, so it's hard to say, but i will say that with any standard aircraft, or helicopter, flying that low, some kind of sound should have been very noticeable!

- my left hand neighbor got a call from a relative in mt. washington, ky, who asked her, "did you see that big orange thing in the sky??" she replied, "yeah, we are watching them right now!!"

- our neighbor jackie got some video of the object, but didn't think it took, because when she had the object in her camera site, her camera went dead, or white, or some malfunction happened.  it wasn't until a few minutes later upon looking at her video again, that she actually did secure some shaky, yet stunning video of the object.

- i set up my cellphone camera on standby and waited for the next pass.  sure enough, i got some footage, but, when i tried to review it, my phone's software reported "unrecognizable file format.", and the clips wouldn't play.  now, how does that happen?  i've shot, saved, downloaded and converted hundreds of videos off of that phone, and have never had trouble like this before!  i'm so glad miss jackie and miss laura was able to grab something!

- i ran across the street and yanked yet another neighbor out of her house,
just to see it and have one more eyewitness.

- i called wave tv3 just to see if anyone else had reported these sightings.  no one had, but the lady on the phone had to go because she was due on the air for the 11 o'clock broadcast.

-  i also called the bullit co. emergency services office, and while i was on the phone with her, another one flew over.  i was hollering and trying to explain what i was seeing as she was listening on the phone.  she said she'd send a car by, but no one ever showed up.  they probably thought it was a joke, or that i was drunk.  i was not.  i do not drink or use any kind of recreational drugs. i'm willing to be tested on that point in any way necessary to prove my sobriety.  my neighbors were sober and very lucid as well.

-  the flight patterns and turns that these vehicles made would never have been possible by standard commercial or military aircraft.  i spent 4 years in the usaf, so i know what i'm talking about.  they eventually just flew off into the horizon, and ascended high up into the atmosphere until that orange glow dimmed out of sight.

my phone number is ### ### #### if you think this is news worthy.  as many people that were outside, lighting fireworks, i just know someone else besides us 5 people saw them, and that 1 lady in mt washington too!!

let me know if you received other reports!!  i have no idea what they were, but they were a spectacular and quite scary site to behold!!"

july 04, 2009, from shepherdsville, ky.
content.flightPath: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: I was outside watching fireworks with my wife and a few neighbors, then bright orange sphere-like flying objects paraded across the sky, and down our street.  5 total objects sighted that night by me, my wife,  and 4 or so neighbors.

content.detailedDescription: After the light faded..We kept staring at the sky for like 10 or 15 minutes, and were actually a little freaked out with the amount of airplanes that were all over the sky. we must have counted like 7 planes all in one area..And like 4 planes in another area..And also random planes just everywhere! some looked close, most looked far. the planes were a bright blinking light with 2 big red lights. very strange and weird feeling.
content.summary: About last post. (bright light, looked like moving star..) i forgot to add . . .

content.detailedDescription: My friends and i were playing frisbee in a huge empty parking lot, and then at 10:39 the lights went out.(they turn off that time every night because of a timer) we looked up at the stars because the sky was really clear. we all noticed a little bright light that looked like a star, only it was moving. we kept watching, and it kept moving in a slow straight path. we know we were watching it for about 4 minutes because our friend called right after, and that was at 10:45. while we were all watching, we saw it dart very quickly to the side..Like it was zig-zagging back and forth..But very fast, and then going straight again on its original path. it did that a bunch of times, then it started to fade in and out, and finally it faded out completely. there was no way it was a plane, and we are all certain of that. it was definitely a cool experience!
content.summary: Bright light, looked like moving star, followed a zig zag path for about 4 minutes before fading away.

content.detailedDescription: I was swimming and then all of the sudden i hear this whisling noise and then i looked up and saw this circle grey object appeared very weird to me so i went to sit inside for w while to make sure that i wasn't going crazy then i came back out again and i saw them again and as i turned away then turned back they dissapeared into the clouds then never came out.
content.summary: Circle object very slow and dissapeared very quickley.

content.detailedDescription: I was outside smoking a cigerette when i noticed a bright light moving from my left to the right when it went behind a tree so i ran down to the end of my drive way to get a better view of the object but the object was gone. i waited outside for the object for about 10 minutes when my girlfriend arrived home from work. i told her about what i saw and we watched the sky for about 10 minutes. all of a sudden just above the tree tops that are appx. a half mile away a very bright light appeares. the object appeared to be stationary but we noticed it moving in all directions. the object then disappeared and re-appeared in the matter of seconds then it dimmed down to a small white light and took off. i tried moving down the street to keep track of the object but the object was gone. when we saw the object we did not know what to think about it because it was the second time we have seen something similar to this. i also noticed an increased number of airplanes in the sky. they seemed to be flying around the area where my girlfriend and i saw the object. also after the object took off, we seen a plane moving at a high rate of speed in the direction the object went.
content.summary: Object appeared then disappeared, then re-appeared and then dimmed down and took off

content.detailedDescription:
My family and i were taking a walk at bluff point, at about 2 pm local time, when i happened to glance up at the sky and see these black dots{actually, first i saw the white puffs, then i noticed something was actually making the puffs, little black dots} flying formation and leaving behind them a series of puffs of smoke (best way to describe it) i could hear jet engine noise and piston engine noise, however we were really close to the groton-new london airport. so i can't tell if they were making any noise. we were on the way back, close to the water and we could see the airport across the water.
my daughter got very excited and thought they might be space ships, my wife didn't know what to think about them. i thought it might be a secret plane, but i'm puzzled at the slow speed and the fact that the dots seemed to make a new puff every 1-1/2 to 2 seconds, a slow interval i thought for it to be an engine. besides they seemed to be moving at the average pace of airliners when they are leaving contrails, when flying high.We then took a few photos and tried to play it off. however, my wife later encouraged my to report the experience since we had taken some pics.
oh! the dates on the pictures are wrong. i never took the time to enter the right date on the camera.
as far as our right location we were headed north towards the picnic area. we were on the western most trail just before were the trail forks.
the objects seemed to be going roughly from west to east.
content.summary: Flying formation with contrail

content.detailedDescription: I was outside smoking a cigarette when i noticed a bright light appearing and moving from my left. i ran down my drive way away from the light to get a better view of it but the object was one. i then waited for about 10 minutes to see if i could see the object again when my girlfriend came home. i told her what i just saw and we were looking into the night sky when all of a sudden a very bright light appeared just over the tree tops approximately a half mile away from our location. the object appeared to be stationed but had slight back and forth, up and down movement. it was also giving off indescribably light source from underneath the object. the object then disappeared, then re-appeared and took off. loosing sight of the object about 2 minutes after we saw it. i noticed an increased number of planes after my first sighting and after the second sighting. the planes where moving much faster then passenger planes do. when my girlfriend and i saw the object we did not know what to think.
content.summary: Very bright light appered then disappeared then appeared again and took off

content.detailedDescription: My daughter was riding her bike in arlington , texas.  she was facing west and noticed the object high in the southern part of the western sky.  it was black and the size of a pencil point. it was falling and then it became orange and began falling faster.  it became orange with an orange tail and began falling very fast.  it then became yellow and started flashing white at the nose.  it was falling in front of the sunset and then turned black. it then fell below the tree line.  she thinks it was at least as far away as fort worth (20 miles) or further.  she thought it was a plane falling, but a plane crossed that area and it was bigger than a plane. then she thought it was a meteor.  she called me on her cell phone and told me about it.  she was very excited.  i have not seen anything about it on the news , maybe it will be on later.
content.summary: It looked like an orange,falling meteor with a long, orange tail.
